Text:
Maxi,
The Shield Season 3 Disc 1: 28.5%
The Shield Season 3 Disc 2: 74.8%
The Shield Season 3 Disc 4: 99.6%

Would you mind terribly to just bump these up to the top of your seeding lists for just a little while?  There are half a dozen guys who patiently hope for you to complete these.

Oh, and for anyone new - this is DVD4/4 not 3/4.

Thanks for this one. Too bad it took me six weeks to download, but still I'm very grateful. :)

Any chance of bumping disc 1 & 2 as well?
